abstract: Robert L. Nardelli, who was ousted as chief executive of Home Depot this year amid shareholder discontent over his enormous pay package, will soon take on one of the most prominent jobs in corporate America: revitalizing the troubled automaker Chrysler.
lead_paragraph: Robert L. Nardelli, who was ousted as chief executive of Home Depot this year amid shareholder discontent over his enormous pay package, will soon take on one of the most prominent jobs in corporate America: revitalizing the troubled automaker Chrysler.

headline.main: Ex-Home Depot Chief to Lead Chrysler
